article_title: Reducing higher education costs would be great, but there is no such thing as 'free college' in the US, and nor should there be
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , bernie sanders, college, higher education, ismail smith-wade-el, college debt, tuition
article_metadata.author: ISMAIL SMITH-WADE-EL | Special to LNP

og.description: Bernie Sanders has proposed offering free tuition to students who want to attend public colleges and universities. It sounds great, but in reality, it would be a bad idea.
